package.name: mcr_object_recognition_linemod
package.description: This node provides a service to learn objects using template matching based on LINE_MOD by Stefan Hinterstoisser (TUM). The input is an RGB and a depth image. The user can configure the matching threshold, which is defined as a percentage. A strong threshold would be 98%, 90% would be much weaker. Values below 88% can be seen as meaningless. Usage hints: The object_learning node uses visual interaction with the user so a screen will be needed
package.author: Alexander Hagg
